Author: AngeloLacrime
Text: Duuude this is exactly how I describe my dysmorphia. The funhouse effect. It's the only way I can think to make people understand it.

Author: CloudySideDown
Text: Body dysmorphia isn't fun. The thinner version. There is now way possible to drop four pants sizes and look thinner. Have you seen the progress pics where people take a pair of each size jean they were at and lay them one on top of the other so all the waists show? You can see how much smaller the current pair of Jeans is to the starting size.
